Articles.Content:
Kind similar to the bug i reported earlier which was tied to the animation. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117693-BUG-You-can-do-science-twice-with-goo-container-or-science-jr](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117693-BUG-You-can-do-science-twice-with-goo-container-or-science-jr)

This one works like this. Have a thermometer and a communotron 16.

1. Log temperature

2. Transmit

3. Log temperature

4. While the antena is retracting from the first transmission (2.), transmit the second record (3.).

The first temperature is then transmited but the second vanishes. So anything you transmit while antenas are retracting vanishes most probably.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T12:56:53Z" title="04/30/2015 12:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by Beduino**
This has been happening to me also but, my game is modded. I will have to try step 4 and see if that works for me.
